text: He manisaharu! Aphno palanakartasita dara mana ra tyasa dinasita pani tarsa jaba ki nata babu aphno chorako kunai kama a'unecha, nata chora babuko kunai kama a'une cha. Niscaya nai allahako vacana satya cha. (Hera) sansarika jivanale kadapi timila'i dhokama naparos, ra nata allahako visayama dhokebaja (saitana)le timila'i bhramama paros
